Literature.Title: A Novel Antimicrobial Peptide Spampcin56-86 from Scylla paramamosain Exerting Rapid Bactericidal and Anti-Biofilm Activity In Vitro and Anti-Infection In Vivo.
Literature.Author: Jiang M, Chen R, Zhang J, Chen F, Wang KJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus CGMCC 1.2465(MIC=12µM),Listeria monocytogenes CGMCC 1.10753(MIC=6µM),Enterococcus faecalis CGMCC 1.2135(MIC=6µM),Enterococcus faecium CGMCC 1.131(MIC=6µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis CGMCC 1.4260(MIC=12µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CGMCC 1.2421(MIC=12µM),Escherichia coli CGMCC 1.2389(MIC=12µM),Acinetobacter baumannii CGMCC 1.6769(MIC=12µM),Cryptococcus neoformans CGMCC 2.1563(MIC=6µM),Fusarium graminearum CGMCC 3.4521(MIC=24µM),Fusarium solani CGMCC 3.5840(MIC=24µM),Aspergillus niger CGMCC 3.316(MIC=24µM)
